Package cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.domain.exceptions

package cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.domain.exceptions
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    InvalidAmountException
    Exception thrown when an invalid amount is specified in a financial transaction.
    InvalidCategoryException
    Exception thrown when an invalid category name is used or manipulated.
    InvalidDateException
    Exception thrown when an invalid date is entered or used in the system.
    InvalidStatisticField
    Exception thrown when an invalid statistic field is encountered during data processing.
    InvalidTimeException
    Exception thrown when an invalid time is entered or used in the system.
    InvalidUserException
    Exception thrown when an operation involving a user fails due to invalid data.
